website_summaries.verdict: A burst of natural sweetness your bird will get excited for.
pros: Natural dried fruits are the only ingredients
Appeals to fruit loving birds like macaws, cockatiels, African greys, cockatoos, and other parrots
Wide variety of decent sized fruit bits
cons: Banana chips may be too large for some birds, but are easy to break

customer_reviews.title: Sunburst True Fruits Bird Treats
customer_reviews.text: Small bag ... my bird really doesn't eat it anyway. She's a conure and for some reason isn't at all impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Kalauni loves Sunburst Fruits!
customer_reviews.text: My parrot loves these dried fruits. She knows the sound of the bag and goes nuts! Good variety and not hard.
customer_reviews.author: rusmilen

customer_reviews.title: Just fruit..
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave about this product enough! It’s hard to find a dried fruit mix that isn’t full of sugar and additives. This fruit mix delivers, it just dried fruit and my Conure loves it as a treat. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rolling Home RV Rentals

customer_reviews.title: Merlin doesn't care for it
customer_reviews.text: I thought my Sun Conure "Merlin" would enjoy this mix. I put some in his dish and thought he was excited. Turns out he couldn't wait to pick it all out of his dish and drop it. Quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Grizz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on Time. My Birds love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was more in the package. And it is a little expensive but it works well to mix in with the Harris food for our Macaw and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Giglio

customer_reviews.title: Better Price Can be Found
customer_reviews.text: My sun conures enjoy this, but of course pick through their favorites. I just found human grade for 10 bux a pound. So, if you look around, you may beat their price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Kitty the conure’s favorite snack to throw at me
customer_reviews.text: Kitty likes these. If she sees me with the bag she starts bobbing her head as if to say yes! Then after she draws blood snatching these up from my fingers, she throws them at me when she realizes they are not nachos. I’m trying to find her a bird therapist to work on her anger issues and nacho obsession. Until then I’m just thankful Alexa can order me queso and chips with just a simple request.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Arruda

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure they’re great for other birds but mine is picky and doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure they’re great for other birds but mine is picky and doesn’t like chewing things. I can’t get him to eat these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent mix, but small package
customer_reviews.text: Not enough fruit. The mix wasn't very even. Our conure is kind of picky and her favorite pieces were the minority.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Scott Laufenberg

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my friends birds and he said it's their favorite treats. I believe it's a sun conure if that matters
customer_reviews.author: Jena Freyermuth

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat
customer_reviews.text: Although expensive, it is worth the price. There is no waste, it is all fruit. Others I have tried have peanuts in the shell, and chili peppers, which my Amazon won't eat. With this product, everything gets eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Rita913

customer_reviews.title: Conures love this
customer_reviews.text: Conures love this and it is very healthy for them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Deskins

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for birds
customer_reviews.text: My green cheek conure loves these treats. Good variety in this bag. Never had any issues. I will add that my dogs love these treats too, since the bird likes to drop them off the edge of his cage for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: After trying other bird products, I only buy Higgins because of the fine quality.
customer_reviews.text: My birds only get the best, and that is, Higgins products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: My Quaker begs almost as much as the dog!
customer_reviews.text: My little Quaker Ellie loves this stuff! I have never met such a good driven bird in my life! Haha next to my little dog she begs just a bad and definitely knows the fridge is where the food come from! But this stuff is one of her favorite as soon as I crinkle the bag she starts going crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: My Nanday Conure loves Higgins Sunburst True Fruits
customer_reviews.text: My Nanday Conure loves most of the items in this product - especially the papaya and pineapple pieces.
customer_reviews.author: hyperluv

customer_reviews.title: Fresh great tasty treat!
customer_reviews.text: Omg my favorite I’m not sure my bird got any 😂😩!
customer_reviews.author: Sharkzzgrl

customer_reviews.title: African grey seems to only like half of the choices
customer_reviews.text: African grey seems to only like half of the choices. Not great for a treat when he refuses to eat most of it.
customer_reviews.author: sanzen

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My birds love the fruit treats. Very fresh. They need to make bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: My jenday conure loves these, but she won't eat ...
customer_reviews.text: My jenday conure loves these, but she won't eat them unless split the pieces in half. This probably says more about her than the product.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My birds love these fruits. Fresh dried fruits that smell very well.
customer_reviews.author: Astrit

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good; however, I believe the size of the fruits for a small conure are a little too large.
customer_reviews.author: Enid

customer_reviews.title: GOOOOOD STUFF indeed
customer_reviews.text: My sun conure loves this stuff. A must try for your feathered friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dove

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey. But my Amazon and Macaw love it mixed in with their food.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Giglio

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT receive the fruit. Instead I received a pack of small dog chews ( with the Higgins fruit sticker attached). Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Birds love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fruit mix! Recommend it. Excellent service and delivery. A++++
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and of course the bird likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smelling fruit
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my parrot's regular food. He loves the fruit.
customer_reviews.author: RobinW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Includes a nice variety of fruits that my conure seems to like. Good product; arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Our parrot loves to have some dried fruit on a daily basis and Sunburst True Fruit is a winner! My order came quickly and we are thrilled with the service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: A yummy mix for your birdie babies! Mine just love this stuff! Give it a try with your birds!
customer_reviews.author: saturday mourning

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: My green cheek conure loves this mix. Always looks fresh and smells fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. James

customer_reviews.title: Conures love it
customer_reviews.text: My sun conures love a little of this mixed in their food!
customer_reviews.author: Dene

customer_reviews.title: My parrot only likes the fruit, will not touch ...
customer_reviews.text: My parrot only likes the fruit, will not touch the banana chips or coconut. It makes him too hyper after only 2 pieces, too much sugar in this product. Will not buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Christine T.

customer_reviews.title: My Green Cheek LOVES this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I give my green cheek conure a pinch of this in his food every morning and it's always the first thing he goes to. The only thing he doesn't seem fond of are the bananas, but he'll occasionally eat one of them. I've regularly bought these for months and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: NHTFR

product_meta.title: Higgins Sunburst True Fruits Gourmet Treats Conures, Parrots & Macaws
product_meta.description: Size:10 OunceA healthy, natural snack mix that supplements your pet's regular diet. Healthy assortment of dried, exotic fruits. This mix encourages your bird's natural foraging instincts.
feature_bullets: Ideal For Conures, Parrots, And Macaws

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
